songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Mansions, hills, and acres
Women, drinks, and caterers
I will toast until the break of dawn
Swimming pools and strippers
Conversation, six figures
Never crossed my mind to call home

[Pre-Chorus]
There's a note on the bathroom mirror
Telling me that you've had enough
It took you leaving me for my blind eyes to see
That you mean

[Chorus]
(Far more) Than this planet to me
(Far more) Than the air I breathe
(Far more) From here to overseas
(Far more) Girl, you're all I need
(Far more) Than the mountains and tree
(Far more) You mean more than the birds and bees
(Far more) Honey, take it from me
(Far more) You are all I need

[Verse 2]
Hanging out with friends
Never calling to check in
Neglecting you in every way
Taking the home front for granted
What was straight is now slanted
And I don't know what to do about this letter

[Pre-Chorus]
There's a note on the bathroom mirror
Telling me that you've had enough
It took you leaving me for my blind eyes to see
That you mean

[Chorus]
(Far more) More than this planet to me
(Far more) More than the air I breathe
(Far more) From here to overseas
(Far more) Girl, you're all I need
(Far more) Than the mountains and tree
(Far more) Than the birds and bees
(Far more) Honey, take it from me
(Far more) You're all I need

[Bridge]
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee bee bop, hip hop
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee bee bop, hip hop
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee bee bop, hip hop
Far more, far more (Nothing can compare to you)
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee bee bop, hip hop
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee bee bop, hip hop
Shoo-wop, shoo-wop
Skiddle-ee, bee bop, hip hop
Far more to me

[Chorus]
(Far more) Than this planet to me
(Far more) Than the air I breathe
(Far more) From here to overseas
(Far more) Girl, you're all I need
(Far more) Than the mountains and tree
(Far more) The birds and bees
(Far more) Honey, take it from me
(Far more) You are all I need, yeah

[Outro]
(Far more) Woo
(Far more) Ever since you've been gone
(Far more) I realize, girl
(Far more) Just what it is I had at home
(Far more) Oh baby, you mean far more
(Far more) Than this planet to me
(Far more) Than this air I breathe
(Far more) Nothing can compare to your love for me

[Chorus]
(Far more) To your love for me
(Far more) To your love for me
(Far more) To your love for me
(Far more)
songs.title: Far More
